message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be the Guy: Christmas 2 (Secret Santa Games 2025) - Day 3
ain't no way you slept today, you were still sending messages at 5am lmao
did he not like the game?
welo is just a fucking enigma, i gave up trying to understand his taste a long time ago
2 needle, 1 avoidance(kinda, quitted early) and 1 peak trap game
i was going from the top to down order in the folder
i love how my game gets selected when i am asleep
yea, only on friday roulette barfy streams at "normal" times, aside of that i hate his stream times
you looked so confused when playing endless enigma LOL
i apologize about the 9 jump i didint know what that is LOL
and yeah sorry for the low quality of the game, it was rather rushed
i feel like some games could be more than a 9 in enjoyment
if I were to stream for 12h I'd have to recharge mu social battery for the next 3 years
have u ever looked up what shmaloogley woogly woo is
the drawing on zen's game was made by me
season 3 is the best thing recently
the witch episode is the greatest masterpiece
whoa, live again already? Christmas came early this year
like i didnt finish everything i wanted to in time
i made it in only 7 days, mainly the visuals suffered

surely there isn't a third screen....

that jump up in the middle looks like the hardest one
the one where you jump up and then do a small jump
oh yeah the jump after the platform bottom right looks rough
what difficulty would you say this     is?
i started this yesterday and was enjoying the story
but looking at this I'm not sure I should continue...
no i just did the intro
if you do that jump you struggle like a setup corner should make it a bit more lenient
u should just try tbh. people rating games be like "here do 3 screens of needle ending on a downward plane - 65"
walk 2 frames right from the wall and then jump and press left at the same time
literally imo the one way to make sure the game is unfun to play
it looked like you were already good at it so no need to force it
@HimuraChiya I'm bad, ill take any advantage i can get to get through needle lol
imo it makes for the least fun to play needle ever
i hate 32px needle and shit so much
setups make those types of jumps go away faster
i just wanna be like "look at jump, be like, yee, kinda jump medium high ish - do jump" thats how i play
i know 1-6f. everything else is idk
tho iirc 14f is absolute trash to get
19f on the first jump is pain tho
most people don't know about the 7f+4+1 jump and where it's used
so we can make dw planes since they dont require 1 specific frame then :)
sometimes specific frameheight jumps are alright if they are intuitive

just keep the one from the drop
